2021-04-24T15-57-07Z.workflow:
name: Release

on: workflow_dispatch

jobs:
  release:

    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v2
        with:
          node-version: 12
      - run: yarn install
      - run: yarn build
      - name: Release
        env:
          GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
          NPM_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.NPM_AUTH_TOKEN }}
        run: yarn semantic-release

2021-12-05T12-42-53Z.workflow:
name: Release

on: workflow_dispatch

jobs:
  release:

    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v2
        with:
          node-version: 12
      - run: yarn install
      - run: yarn build
      - name: Release
        env:
          GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
          NPM_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.NPM_AUTH_TOKEN }}
        run: yarn semantic-release --branches main

2022-01-31T20-33-20Z.workflow:
name: Release

on: workflow_dispatch

jobs:
  release:

    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v2
        with:
          node-version: 16
      - run: yarn install
      - run: yarn build
      - name: Release
        env:
          GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
          NPM_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.NPM_AUTH_TOKEN }}
        run: yarn semantic-release --branches main

2024-03-03T15-18-43Z.workflow:
name: Release

on: workflow_dispatch

jobs:
  release:

    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v2
        with:
          node-version: 18.17
      - run: yarn install
      - run: yarn build
      - name: Release
        env:
          GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
          NPM_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.NPM_AUTH_TOKEN }}
        run: yarn semantic-release --branches main
